Review_title: Happy, that at least 34 years late, but the culprits were imprisoned, poor of their descendants...
Review_Text: The type of documentary that we would prefer that didn't exist, in fact, the type of crime that should never exist, the ones that come from racism and racial prejudice, of whatever type, I would rather not have watched, and not have known about this brutal crime , with such disgusting cruelty, that hurt in the soul, I didn't know about the crime, and its impunity, I can't measure the pain that this family and friends must feel... Happy, that at least 34 years late, but the culprits were imprisoned, poor of their descendants... Happy, that at least 34 years late, but the culprits were imprisoned, poor of their descendants...
